original: Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto nasaṅkilesiko dhammo
analyzed: kilesa vippayuttam na saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca kilesa vippayuttaḥ na saṅkilesikaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā kilesa vippayuttam na saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca kilesa vippayuttaḥ

original: naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kilesa vippayuttam na saṅkilesikam dhamma

original: paṭicca kilesavippayutto nasaṅkilesiko ca kilesavippayutto naasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā
analyzed: paṭicca kilesa vippayuttaḥ na saṅkilesikaḥ ca kilesa vippayuttaḥ na asaṅkilesiko ca dhammā

original: Kilesavippayuttaṁ naasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kilesa vippayuttam na asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca kilesa vippayuttaḥ na asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikañca kilesavippayuttaṁ naasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: kilesa vippayuttam na saṅkilesikam ca kilesa vippayuttam na asaṅkilesikam ca dhammam paṭicca kilesa vippayuttaḥ na asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
